name: Pexeso The Card Game BETA
description:
Welcome Gamers. Are you searching for a classic card game that is fun for your friends and family. Well, you've come to the right place. Pexeso is a classic memory card game to test you're brain. This is the BETA, so don't expect a perfect game. Take turns with people, and see who can match the most cards. Feel free to leave suggestions. 

- Special Thanks to Unity In Action By Joseph Hocking, and Steven Baar for the basics. I completed the tutorial, and added a lot more.
